content: With all the cleaning you'll be doing for the holidays, this Dyson bagless stick vacuum might make all of it a little easier, and you can save $150 on it today. SEE ALSO: Which robot vacuum should you get? This list can help you figure it out. This cord-free vacuum uses a lithium-ion battery that supposedly allows 40 minutes of cleaning without losing any power. It covers carpet and hardwood floors, is versatile enough to clean around corners and on ceilings, and it easily switches to a handheld mode for cleaning stairs. The Dyson bagless stick vacuum is normally a whopping $600, but you can get it for a special discount price of $450. Image: Dyson Save $150 on the Dyson Bagless Stick Vacuum See Details

Save $150 on this bagless stick vacuum by Dyson

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Carlos CadornigaMashable Deals2017-11-29 14:59:31 UTC

With all the cleaning you'll be doing for the holidays, this Dyson bagless stick vacuum might make all of it a little easier, and you can save $150 on it today.

SEE ALSO: Which robot vacuum should you get? This list can help you figure it out.

This cord-free vacuum uses a lithium-ion battery that supposedly allows 40 minutes of cleaning without losing any power. It covers carpet and hardwood floors, is versatile enough to clean around corners and on ceilings, and it easily switches to a handheld mode for cleaning stairs.

The Dyson bagless stick vacuum is normally a whopping $600, but you can get it for a special discount price of $450.




Save $150 on the Dyson Bagless Stick Vacuum
